featured.text: A goat came in our tent at night and ate most of our food!
Herds of goats and cows 26 enormous horns graze the lush green fields.

definition.zh_def: 山羊，一種常見的家畜，通常用於提供乳製品、肉類和毛髮。
definition.en_def: A goat is a common domesticated animal, often kept for its milk, meat, and hair.
definition.example: The farmer has several goats in his pasture.
